com.paypoint.sdk.library.payment

Class PaymentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paypoint.sdk.library.payment.PaymentManager

  • public class PaymentManager
extends Object
    Handles payments

    Call makePayment(PaymentRequest) to initiate payment

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static PaymentManager getInstance(android.content.Context context)

      • setSessionTimeout

        public PaymentManager setSessionTimeout(int sessionTimeoutSeconds)
        Timeout waiting for a callback when making a payment. SDK guarantees to make callback within this period. Defaults to 60s. DO NOT ALTER WITHOUT GOOD REASON
        Parameters:
        sessionTimeoutSeconds - timeout for making a payment in second
        Returns:
        PaymentManager for chaining

      • setUrl

        public PaymentManager setUrl(String url)
        URL of the PayPoint server
        Parameters:
        url - the base url of the PayPoint server. The URL can be obtained from EndpointManager.getEndpointUrl(com.paypoint.sdk.library.network.EndpointManager.Environment)
        Returns:
        PaymentManager for chaining

      • setCredentials

        public PaymentManager setCredentials(PayPointCredentials credentials)
        Set PayPoint authentication credentials - retrieve these from a call to YOUR server
        Parameters:
        credentials - the credentials required to make a payment
        Returns:
        PaymentManager for chaining

      • registerPaymentCallback

        public void registerPaymentCallback(PaymentManager.MakePaymentCallback callback)
        Register the payment callback. Call this prior to makePayment(PaymentRequest)
        Parameters:
        callback - callback when payment completed (success or fail)

      • unregisterPaymentCallback

        public void unregisterPaymentCallback()
        Unregister the payment callback. Call this prior to exiting your payment activity/fragment

      • lockCallback

        public void lockCallback()
        Locks the callback mechanism during screen orientation change. Call this BEFORE unregisterPaymentCallback() in onPause() activity/fragment lifecycle e.g. 

        protected void onPause() {
  super.onPause();

  paymentManager.lockCallback();
  paymentManager.unregisterPaymentCallback();
}

      • unlockCallback

        public void unlockCallback()
        Unlocks the callback mechanism during screen orientation change. Call this AFTER registerPaymentCallback(com.paypoint.sdk.library.payment.PaymentManager.MakePaymentCallback) in onResume() activity/fragment lifecycle e.g. 

        protected void onResume() {
  super.onResume();

  paymentManager.registerPaymentCallback(this);
  paymentManager.unlockCallback();
}

      • makePayment

        public String makePayment(PaymentRequest request)
                   throws PaymentValidationException,
                          InvalidCredentialsException,
                          TransactionInProgressException
        Asynchronously make the payment using the values specified in the request

        You must call these functions first:

        registerPaymentCallback(com.paypoint.sdk.library.payment.PaymentManager.MakePaymentCallback)

        setUrl(String)

        setCredentials(com.paypoint.sdk.library.security.PayPointCredentials)

        Parameters:
        request - payment details
        Returns:
        unique identifier - use this to query transaction status in getTransactionStatus(String)
        Throws:
        PaymentValidationException - incorrect payment details in the request. Use PaymentValidationException.getErrorCode() to determine error
        InvalidCredentialsException - missing token, installation id or server url
        TransactionInProgressException - a transaction is in flight, please wait for the callback

      • getTransactionStatus

        public void getTransactionStatus(String operationId)
                          throws InvalidCredentialsException,
                                 TransactionInProgressException,
                                 TransactionSuspendedFor3DSException
        Get the status of a transaction
        Parameters:
        operationId - - identifier returned from makePayment(PaymentRequest)
        Throws:
        InvalidCredentialsException - missing token, installation id or server url
        TransactionInProgressException - if a transaction is currently in progress - try again when the SDK has executed the callback
        TransactionSuspendedFor3DSException - the SDK is waiting for the user to complete 3D Secure authentication - tey again when the SDK has executed the callback

      • validatePaymentDetails

        public void validatePaymentDetails(PaymentRequest request)
                            throws PaymentValidationException
        Validates the payment request. Call this prior to going online to get PayPoint credentials for the call to makePayment(PaymentRequest) to detect any errors in the payment form
        Parameters:
        request - payment request
        Throws:
        PaymentValidationException - error validating payment request

      • validateCardPan

        public void validateCardPan(String pan)
                     throws PaymentValidationException
        Validates PAN/card number. Useful for inline form validation
        Parameters:
        pan - card PAN
        Throws:
        PaymentValidationException - error validating card PAN

      • validateCardExpiry

        public void validateCardExpiry(String expiry)
                        throws PaymentValidationException
        Validates card expiry. Useful for inline form validation
        Parameters:
        expiry - card expiry date
        Throws:
        PaymentValidationException - error validating card expiry date

      • validateCardCv2

        public void validateCardCv2(String cv2)
                     throws PaymentValidationException
        Validates cv2. Useful for inline form validation
        Parameters:
        cv2 - card CV2
        Throws:
        PaymentValidationException - error validating card CV2
